name: A Colorful Wave
description:
A Colorful Wave was completed by an artist names James Pullara. James has been an artist that uses only 1/2 the vision of other artists. James has Type 1 juvenile onset Diabetes and has battled with blindness for a few years now. Just recently James started his amazing colorful paintings and drawings and has fallen in love with the beauty his vision has been able to convey for his fans.

I hope you appreciate the colorful beauty James has been able to portray in his artwork.

Please know that 20% of the earnings will go to The Ocean Conservancy to help save our Oceans and animal life.

With Each Purchase You Will Receive The Actual Painting In The Mail After Sale Is Completed.







Size '16x20'
